author: George Glover
title: Gold Price Rises. Its Role as a Reserve Asset Is Growing.
description: The Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq are pointing lower in premarket trading. Treasury yields and Bitcoin are inching up.
content: Gold prices were rising on Wednesday as investors snapped up the safe-haven asset amid uncertainty about the looming inflation report and a 30-year Treasury auction that will show how the market is f… [+370 chars]
